languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, ваш план увенчался успехом — провокация против Немезита и убийство изменника Адальберта заставили заговорщиков зашевелиться! Мои блюстители отловили нескольких подозрительных личностей и выбили из них правду. Мерзавец Немезит желает отомстить за гибель наставника и планирует налет на торжественную церемонию помазания офицеров на должности".

"Lord Captain, your plan was a success! Our provocation against Nemesite and the killing of the traitor Adalbert has brought out all the rest of them. My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beaten the truth out of them. That scum Nemesite wishes to avenge his mentor's death and plans to raid the ceremony of the officers' anointment."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, ваш план увенчался успехом — провокация против Немезита и убийство изменника Адальберта заставили заговорщиков зашевелиться! Мои блюстители отловили нескольких подозрительных личностей и выбили из них правду. Мерзавец Немезит желает отомстить за гибель наставника и планирует налет на торжественную церемонию помазания офицеров на должности".

"Lord Captain, your plan was a success,, the provocation against Nemesite has stirred the traitors who sympathise with him! My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beat the truth out of them. The vile Nemesite wishes to avenge his damaged reputation and plans to raid the Ceremony of the Officers' Anointment."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Euer Plan war ein Erfolg! Unsere Provokation gegenüber Nemesit und der Tod des Verräters Adalbert hat den Rest von ihnen angelockt. Meine Enforcer haben mehrere Verdächtige festgesetzt und die Wahrheit aus ihnen herausgeprügelt. Nemesit will den Tod seines Mentors rächen und plant einen Überfall auf die Salbungszeremonie der Offiziere.
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your plan was a success! Our provocation against Nemesite and the killing of the traitor Adalbert has brought out all the rest of them. My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beaten the truth out of them. That scum Nemesite wishes to avenge his mentor's death and plans to raid the ceremony of the officers' anointment."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Euer Plan war ein Erfolg! Unsere Provokation gegenüber Nemesit und der Tod des Verräters Adalbert hat den Rest von ihnen angelockt. Meine Enforcer haben mehrere Verdächtige festgesetzt und die Wahrheit aus ihnen herausgeprügelt. Nemesit will den Tod seines Mentors rächen und plant einen Überfall auf die Salbungszeremonie der Offiziere.

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, su plan ha sido un éxito! Provocar a Nemesitio y matar al traidor Adalbert ha hecho salir al resto de los traidores. Mis guardias han capturado a varios sospechosos y les han sacado la verdad a golpes. Esa escoria de Nemesitio pretende vengar la muerte de su mentor atacando la ceremonia de unción de los oficiales».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your plan was a success! Our provocation against Nemesite and the killing of the traitor Adalbert has brought out all the rest of them. My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beaten the truth out of them. That scum Nemesite wishes to avenge his mentor's death and plans to raid the ceremony of the officers' anointment."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, su plan ha sido un éxito! Provocar a Nemesitio y matar al traidor Adalbert ha hecho salir al resto de los traidores. Mis guardias han capturado a varios sospechosos y les han sacado la verdad a golpes. Esa escoria de Nemesitio pretende vengar la muerte de su mentor atacando la ceremonia de unción de los oficiales».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、計画は成功しました！ネメサイトに対する挑発と裏切り者のアダルバートの殺害が、連中の残党をすべて引きずり出しました。私のエンフォーサーは不審人物を何人も捕らえ、真実を吐き出させています。あのネメサイトは、メンターの死に復讐することを望み、士官の叙任式を襲撃する計画を立てているとのことです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your plan was a success! Our provocation against Nemesite and the killing of the traitor Adalbert has brought out all the rest of them. My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beaten the truth out of them. That scum Nemesite wishes to avenge his mentor's death and plans to raid the ceremony of the officers' anointment."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、計画は成功しました！ネメサイトに対する挑発と裏切り者のアダルバートの殺害が、連中の残党をすべて引きずり出しました。私のエンフォーサーは不審人物を何人も捕らえ、真実を吐き出させています。あのネメサイトは、メンターの死に復讐することを望み、士官の叙任式を襲撃する計画を立てているとのことです」

languages.text: “舰长大人，您的计划大获成功！我们惹怒了涅墨斯特，处决了叛徒阿达伯特，成功地把那些同情他的叛徒引了出来。我的执法者抓住了一群可疑分子，从他们口中逼出了真相。涅墨斯特那个渣滓打算袭击军官的受膏仪式，以此为他的导师复仇。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your plan was a success! Our provocation against Nemesite and the killing of the traitor Adalbert has brought out all the rest of them. My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beaten the truth out of them. That scum Nemesite wishes to avenge his mentor's death and plans to raid the ceremony of the officers' anointment."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您的计划大获成功！我们惹怒了涅墨斯特，处决了叛徒阿达伯特，成功地把那些同情他的叛徒引了出来。我的执法者抓住了一群可疑分子，从他们口中逼出了真相。涅墨斯特那个渣滓打算袭击军官的受膏仪式，以此为他的导师复仇。”

languages.text: « Votre plan a fonctionné, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nos provocations envers Némésite et l'exécution du traître Adalbert ont poussé leurs comparses à sortir de leur trou. Mes hommes ont capturé un certain nombre de suspects et ont réussi à leur faire cracher le morceau. Ce fumier entend venger la mort de son mentor en commettant un attentat lors de la cérémonie de consécration des officiers. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your plan was a success! Our provocation against Nemesite and the killing of the traitor Adalbert has brought out all the rest of them. My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beaten the truth out of them. That scum Nemesite wishes to avenge his mentor's death and plans to raid the ceremony of the officers' anointment."

traits.locale_text: « Votre plan a fonctionné, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nos provocations envers Némésite et l'exécution du traître Adalbert ont poussé leurs comparses à sortir de leur trou. Mes hommes ont capturé un certain nombre de suspects et ont réussi à leur faire cracher le morceau. Ce fumier entend venger la mort de son mentor en commettant un attentat lors de la cérémonie de consécration des officiers. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, planınız başarılı oldu! Nemezit'e karşı yürüttüğümüz provokasyon ve hain Adalbert'i öldürmemiz, geri kalan hepsini ortaya çıkardı. İnfazcılarım, birçok şüpheli kişiyi yakalayarak hakikati ağızlarından döve döve aldı. O şerefsiz Nemezit, yönderinin ölümünün intikamını almayı ve subayların kutsanma törenine baskın düzenlemeyi planlıyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your plan was a success! Our provocation against Nemesite and the killing of the traitor Adalbert has brought out all the rest of them. My enforcers have captured a number of suspicious individuals and beaten the truth out of them. That scum Nemesite wishes to avenge his mentor's death and plans to raid the ceremony of the officers' anointment."
